CLOCKWISE_WHEEL_DISTANCE - Static variable in class nxt.NXTConstants
 
correctHeading(Navigation) - Method in class nxt.nav.USCorrection
Corrects the heading of the robot using knows walls on the side.
COUNTERCLOCKWISE_WHEEL_DISTANCE - Static variable in class nxt.NXTConstants
 
CS - Static variable in class nxt.NXTConstants
 
CS_ANGLE - Static variable in class nxt.NXTConstants
 
CS_DISTANCE - Static variable in class nxt.NXTConstants
 
CS_PORT - Static variable in class nxt.NXTConstants
 
CS_VALUE - Static variable in class nxt.comm.BluetoothProtocol
 
CS_X - Static variable in class nxt.NXTConstants
 
CS_Y - Static variable in class nxt.NXTConstants
 
CSCorrection - Class in nxt.nav
A class that implements correction on the position when grid lines are detected on the floor by a color sensor.
CSCorrection(DataCenter) - Constructor for class nxt.nav.CSCorrection
 
CSListener - Interface in nxt.nav
An interface to be implemented by all classes that wish to listen for the color sensor's detection of a grid line.
CSLocalization - Class in nxt.nav
A class used to perform localization using the color sensor.
CSLocalization(DataCenter, Navigation) - Constructor for class nxt.nav.CSLocalization
 
CSPoller - Class in nxt.drivers
A class that continuously polls the color sensor for data and uses that data to detect grid lines on the floor.
CSPoller(DataCenter) - Constructor for class nxt.drivers.CSPoller
